# openInPlace

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether you should open the URL at its current location instead of copying it to your app’s container.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var openInPlace: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], copy the document to your app’s container before opening the file. When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], open the existing URL in its current location.
title: openInPlace
